snippet: The Pakistani Navy said it repelled a terrorist attack over the weekend after a six-hour exchange of fire at a naval dockyard in the southern port city of Karachi.
abstract: Pakistani Navy repels terrorist attack at naval dockyard in Karachi; two militants are killed and four are arrested; Taliban claims responsibility.
lead_paragraph: The Pakistani Navy said it repelled a terrorist attack over the weekend after a six-hour exchange of fire at a naval dockyard in the southern port city of Karachi.

headline.main: Pakistan: Troops Fend Off Militant Attack in Karachi
headline.print_headline: Pakistan: Troops Fend Off Militant Attack in Karachi
